name: Turn Away
description:
Turn Away is a mother's quest to keep her child safe from the evil in the world. They come from everywhere!  Don't look at them, just turn away! 

How far can you make it without seeing the evil in this endless arcade?  Will the mother's love and protection prove effective?

  • Controls:

WASD / Arrow Keys to Turn

Submission for ENTA Halloween Game Jam

  • Instructions

The Devil comes from all 4 directions. Press WASD / Arrow Keys to turn and look in any other direction. 

The pacing and difficulty ramps us as the game progresses.

The game gets over when you see the evil!

Game by Madhur Arora

Background Music Credits:

Joe Baxter-Webb (BossLevel VGM)

EmmaMA

Thank you for playing! Any feedback is appreciated :-)
